subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Golf
Women's PGA Championship (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Ms. Spuzich’s first pro victory came in the 1966 United States Women’s Open, and at 45 she became the tour’s oldest player to win two tournaments in one season.
snippet: Ms. Spuzich’s first pro victory came in the 1966 United States Women’s Open, and at 45 she became the tour’s oldest player to win two tournaments in one season.
